EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_HK_CloudNative Workshop_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/hongkong]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Hong Kong. Please see event details below:
Date & Location
Date: Thursday, October 13, 2016 Time: 9:00 AM–5:00 PM Location: Jardine OneSolution Office <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Jardine+OneSolution+(2001)+Sdn.+Bhd./@3.098425,101.5886131,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x31cc4c3dc3155687:0x5e27d6ecdca0470f!8m2!3d3.0984196!4d101.5908018]]> Address: 19/F, Tower One, Millennium City 1, 388 Kwun Tong Road, Kowloon, HONG KONG
{{my.Save the Date}}
Agenda
9:00–9:30 AM Registration
9:30–10:15 AM Overview of Cloud Native Architecture
10:15–11:00 AM Introduction to Pivotal Cloud Foundry
11:00–11:15 AM Break
11:15 AM–12:30 PM Hands-On Experience with PCF (push, bind, scale, monitor)
12:30–2:00 PM Lunch
2:00–2:45 PM Overview of Spring Boot and Spring Cloud
2:45–4:30 PM Hands-On Experience Developing Spring Boot and Spring Cloud Applications
4:30–5:00 PM Wrap Up, Q&A, Feedback
Speakers
- Hin Lam, Platform Architect - Derrick Wong, Platform Architect
Prerequisites
A laptop is required if you intend to participate in the hands-on labs. All other required software will be installed during the labs.
Questions? Email greaterchina_marketing@pivotal.io <[[mailto:greaterchina_marketing@pivotal.io]]> or call 400 135 8900.
